name: Prototype 3 (val17102)
description:
Download the file for Windows

Run the executable called MegaproyectoPixel.exe

Red bar represents your life

Blue bar represents insanity, the more it fills up, the more your controls will be affected negatively such as slower movement speed, slower reload speed, blurred vision and an increased weapon sway.

You must use items from the inventory menu, including ammunition. Healing items will recover health over time.

Find a way out.

Movement: WASD

Open Menu: ESC.

Open Inventory: TAB.

Run: SHIFT.

Reload: R.

Flashlight: B.
